content:
Check:
  all:
    - name:
      operator: not_equal_to
      value:
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0011
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when variable format does not match SDTM-specified controlled
  terminology or format guidelines for variables (when provided)
Outcome:
  Message: Variable format does not match SDTM-specified controlled terminology or
    format guidelines for variables (when provided)
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Dataset
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0011
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Following SDTM-specified controlled terminology and
                  format guidelines for variables, when provided
                Document: IG v3.4
                Section: 3.2.2
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Trigger error when variable format does not match SDTM-specified controlled terminology or format guidelines for variables (when provided)

Outcome.Message: Variable format does not match SDTM-specified controlled terminology or format guidelines for variables (when provided)

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Following SDTM-specified controlled terminology and format guidelines for variables, when provided
